## Abstract Submission

For AMPC 2020 we are proposing a mix of long and short talks. A long talk is allocated a total of 20 minutes (15 minutes for the talk, 5 minutes of questions), and a short talk is allocated 10 minutes (8 minutes for the talk, 2 minutes of questions).

The deadline for submissions and registration is **January 27th, 2020**. To submit your abstract, follow the link to the [submission portal](https://forms.gle/VzkCE29zU5NdovdK9).

## Conference Schedule

A detailed schedule and program of abstracts will be posted closer to the event. The overall plan, however, is to run all-day schedules on Wednesday and Thursday and a half-day on Friday. The conference dinner will be on Thursday night.

## Venue and Accomodation

The venue for the conference will be the [Coogee Bay Hotel](https://coogeebayhotel.com.au/) opposite the lovely Coogee Beach. We will not be arranging conference deals for accomodation, but there are many accommodation options in and around Coogee. A few possibilities are listed below: 

- [Crowne Plaza Coogee](https://www.ihg.com/crowneplaza/hotels/us/en/sydney/sydcb/hoteldetail?cm_mmc=GoogleMaps-_-CP-_-AU-_-SYDCB)

## Code of Conduct

All attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers at our conference are required to agree with the following code of conduct. Our conference is dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or technology choices. We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any conference venue, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.

If you have any concerns during your time at the conference, please contact one of the organisers.
